name: LoopJump
description:
Use momentum and timing to throw yourself to the top of the wall of pins. Made in a few hours for the Black and White Jam 8.

Credits:

AaronBacon - Programming - https://aaronsnetwork.com/
Checker_Box - Art  - https://twitter.com/Checker_Box_

Controls:

A and D or Left and Right Arrows - Swing Left or Right

Space - Activate/Deactivate Pins

R - Quick restart to last checkpoint

L - Full Restart, sends you back to the beginning

Deactivate pins while you're swinging to fling yourself higher up the stage, then activate while a pin is in your loop to hook onto it.
